title: UGC NET 2025 Admit Card Released
summary: NTA has released the admit cards for UGC NET June 2025. Download now from the official website.
content:
### Admit Card Details

You can now download your **UGC NET June 2025** admit card from [https://ugcnet.nta.nic.in](https://ugcnet.nta.nic.in).

![Admit Card](https://example.com/images/admitcard.png)

Make sure to verify the exam center, date, and your credentials.
